argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = b -> ( A rmX a ) = ( A rmX b ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = M -> ( A rmX a ) = ( A rmX M ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = N -> ( A rmX a ) = ( A rmX N ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_nn0ssre | |- NN0 C_ RR |
| 5 |  | #P_nn0z | |- ( a e. NN0 -> a e. ZZ ) |
| 6 |  | #P_frmx | |- rmX : ( ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) X. ZZ ) --> NN0 |
| 7 | 6 | #P_fovcl | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmX a ) e. NN0 ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. NN0 ) -> ( A rmX a ) e. NN0 ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_nn0red | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. NN0 ) -> ( A rmX a ) e. RR ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ltrmxnn0 | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. NN0 /\ b e. NN0 ) -> ( a < b <-> ( A rmX a ) < ( A rmX b ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_biimpd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. NN0 /\ b e. NN0 ) -> ( a < b -> ( A rmX a ) < ( A rmX b ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3expb | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ ( a e. NN0 /\ b e. NN0 ) ) -> ( a < b -> ( A rmX a ) < ( A rmX b ) ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 9, 12 | #P_leord1 | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ ( M e. NN0 /\ N e. NN0 ) ) -> ( M <_ N <-> ( A rmX M ) <_ ( A rmX N ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_3impb | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ M e. NN0 /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( M <_ N <-> ( A rmX M ) <_ ( A rmX N ) ) ) |
